Can Indian Economy expect revival despite rising inflation? What do you think are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country?

yes, Indian Economy can expect revival despite rising inflation because their are many talented and educated people in our country the only thing is those talents are not utilizing in the best way to achieve the economic goals of our country. Every individual who is living in this country should not only think about themselves but also for the welfare of our country then only we can expect good economic conditions in the country.

 As we know that India is a developing country, so in such case it becomes necessary to take initiative steps to have a control on inflation. Today we can see that the prices are raising like anything one of the main reason for this is value of our rupee is going down each and everyday another main reason is most of our necessary things which we need in our daily life are importing from other countries that means we are depending on other countries for our necessary things like onions, petrol etc.

I think the following are the major steps that can be taken in present circumstances to push growth in the country:

1) One of the major step to increase the growth of the country is importing goods from other countries should be avoided to large extent.

2) Not only the government, but also every citizen of India should strive  for the growth of the country.

3) We should make the best use of our resources which are available in the country that means avoid wastage.
